title: Westbound lanes of VA 7 in Leesburg reopened
text:
Updated at 7:48 a.m.

All lanes of westbound VA 7 have reopened.

FINAL: Crash. VA-7 WB (E Market Street) at US-15 (Leesburg Bypass). Loudoun County, VA. All lanes are open. Delays begin at US-15 and are less than a mile. — MATOC Alerts (@MATOC) September 16, 2019

Original post at 6:45 a.m.

An overturned vehicle has closed VA 7 westbound in Leesburg.

It’s not immediately clear if anyone was seriously hurt.

The road is closed near US 15, and it’s not known how long the road will be shut down. Drivers should expect delays.
description: A crash has closed part of VA 7 westbound at US 15 in Leesburg.
